subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Rangers, who had lost 9 of their previous 10 games at the Bell Centre in Montreal, crushed a sluggish Canadiens team, 7-2, in the opener of the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: The Rangers, who had lost 9 of their previous 10 games at the Bell Centre in Montreal, crushed a sluggish Canadiens team, 7-2, in the opener of the Eastern Conference finals.
